long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Name: Pi-oneer

Description:
Explore the captivating world of pi with Pi-oneer, a Chrome extension created by noobdev! Pi-oneer is more than just a gameâ€”it's an educational tool designed to make learning the digits of pi an engaging and enjoyable experience.

Key Features:

Customizable Gameplay:
Tailor your pi-learning journey by adjusting game parameters such as enabling a timer, allowing mistakes, and choosing the number of digits for each round. Pi-oneer adapts to your preferences for a personalized learning experience.

Enhance Memory Skills:
Challenge yourself and improve your memory skills by progressively learning more digits of pi. Pi-oneer provides a fun and interactive way to boost your numerical memory.

User-Friendly Interface:
The extension features a user-friendly interface that makes navigating through pi digits a breeze. Whether you're a pi enthusiast or a beginner, Pi-oneer provides a seamless and enjoyable learning environment.

Link to Support:
Pi-oneer gives you the opportunity to support the developer, noobdev, by providing a link to Buy Me a Coffee. Your contributions help in maintaining and improving this educational extension.

Why Choose Pi-oneer:
Embark on a pi-filled adventure with Pi-oneer! Whether you're a student, math enthusiast, or just curious about the wonders of pi, this extension offers an accessible and entertaining way to expand your knowledge.

Get Started:
Install Pi-oneer today and unlock the world of pi at your fingertips. Learn, challenge yourself, and have fun with the digits of pi right from your Chrome browser.

Note:
Pi-oneer respects your privacy and only collects necessary information to enhance your experience. Refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
